name: SwapSubscriptionPlan
description:
Swap a subscription plan variation for an existing subscription.

This tool schedules a SWAP_PLAN action to change the plan variation for an existing subscription. It should be called when a user wants to update the current plan of their subscription. For detailed guidance, refer to the Swap Subscription Plan Variations documentation.

parameters.name: subscription_id
parameters.description: The ID of the subscription to swap the plan for. This is required to identify which subscription will have its plan changed.

value_schema.description: The ID of the subscription to swap the subscription plan for.

parameters.name: swap_plan_details
parameters.description: JSON object with 'new_plan_variation_id' and 'phases' for the swap. 'new_plan_variation_id' is required, 'phases' is a list of phase-specific info.

new_plan_variation_id.description:
The ID of the new subscription plan variation.

This field is required.

ordinal.description: index of phase in total subscription plan

order_template_id.description: id of order to be used in billing

phases.description: A list of PhaseInputs, to pass phase-specific information used in the swap.

value_schema.description:
An object containing the fields to POST for the request.

See the corresponding object definition for field details.
